mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS ( target_type, target_seq, mem_id, comment_content ) VALUES ( #{target_type}, #{target_seq}, #{mem_id}, #{comment_content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTS SET comment_content = #{comment_content}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE comment_seq = #{comment_seq}
UPDATE COMMENTS SET deleted_at = SYSDATE WHERE comment_seq = #{comment_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT comment_seq, target_type, target_seq, mem_id, comment_content, created_at, updated_at FROM COMMENTS WHERE comment_seq = #{comment_seq}

SELECT comment_seq, target_type, target_seq, mem_id, comment_content, created_at, updated_at FROM COMMENTS WHERE target_type = #{target_type} AND target_seq = #{target_seq} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC, comment_seq DESC
